div.h2: Welcome to the Gulf Coast Trades Center
div.p: The Gulf Coast Trades Center is a private, non-profit educational institution dedicated to increasing the economic independence and social well-being of disadvantaged and adjudicated youth. We annually serve several hundred youth providing a comprehensive array of education, counseling, residential, job referral, and community services. This matrix of services is provided in New Waverly, TX by our dedicated staff in a “no fail” atmosphere, which emphasizes the worth of each individual.

Alert: In accordance with Governor Abbott’s declaration, effective today, GCTC is temporarily suspending student visitation until further notice. Court appointed professionals are exempted from this suspension. Please monitor our website for future updates.

div.style: height:585px;background:url(https://scschoolfiles.s3.amazonaws.com/lib/gabbartsite/Widgets_NoNews.png); background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-color:#fff;

div.p: Alert: In accordance with Governor Abbott’s declaration, effective today, GCTC is temporarily suspending student visitation until further notice. Court appointed professionals are exempted from this suspension. Please monitor our website for future updates.

div.class: custom_108503 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

p.span: The Gulf Coast Trades Center and Raven Charter School District prohibit discrimination on the grounds of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, political affiliation, or belief, and against any beneficiary of programs financially assisted under Title I, WIOA on the basis of citizenship/status as a lawfully admitted immigrant authorized to work in the United States or his or her participation in any WIOA Title I financially assisted program or activity. The Equal Employment Opportunity Officer is Dr. Dale Underwood, at Email: dale.underwood@gctcw.org and Phone: (936) 344-6677.
